name: Nekomitori Checkmate puzzles Pyramid
description:
A question-based pyramid variation of Solitaire.

Rules

- You may only remove a card if it is not covered by another card.

- You may only remove a card if it is the proper suit and sequence.

- You must remove all cards from the board to win.

Each time you solve a question you earn points.

Points may be spent to unlock an illustration.
